Title: RACING Downpipe Back system (with selectable tail pipes) for BMW M2 G87, NO EC type approval SKU: 081023 1510-3
Body (HTML): RACING Downpipe Back system (with selectable tail pipes) for BMW M2 G87, NO EC type approval SKU: 081023 1510-3 Installation/fitting at the serial mounting points. Including mounting material. Attention: The original exhaust will need to be cut! Can only be used in combination with connection tube package 081023 1400. Original tube Ø 70mm REMUS tubes Ø 76mm Features: Aggressive Racing Sound Increased Performance and Torque Reduced weight up to -10kg Optimized flow and back pressure Stainless steel Handmade in Austria Choose from a wide variety of tail pipes 2 years of warranty RACING version, without homologation
